018package org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.java;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import javax.script.Compilable;
023import javax.script.ScriptEngine;
024
025import org.apiguardian.api.API;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
027
028/**
029 *  This is the script engine for the Java programming language.
030 *
031 *  @extauthor  Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
032 *  @thanks A. Sundararajan
033 *  @version $Id: JavaEngine.java 878 2021-02-20 19:56:13Z tquadrat $
034 *  @since 0.1.0
035 *
036 *  @UMLGraph.link
037 */
038@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: JavaEngine.java 878 2021-02-20 19:56:13Z tquadrat $" )
039@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
040public sealed interface JavaEngine extends ScriptEngine, Compilable permits org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.internal.JavaEngineImpl
041{
042        /*-----------*\
043    ====** Constants **========================================================
044        \*-----------*/
045    /**
046     *  The name for the variable that holds the classpath: {@value}.
047     */
048    public static final String CLASSPATH = "classpath";
049
050    /**
051     *  The name for the variable that holds the name of the main class:
052     *  {@value}.
053     */
054    public static final String MAINCLASS = "mainClass";
055
056    /**
057     *  The name for the variable that holds the class of the parent class
058     *  loader: {@value}.
059     */
060    public static final String PARENTLOADER = "parentLoader";
061
062    /**
063     *  The name for the variable that holds the source path (the location for
064     *  additional source files): {@value}.
065     */
066    public static final String SOURCEPATH = "sourcepath";
067
068    /**
069     *  For certain variables, we look for System properties. This is the
070     *  prefix used for such System properties: {@value}.
071     *
072     *  @see System#getProperties()
073     */
074    public static final String SYSPROP_PREFIX = "com.sun.script.java.";
075
076        /*---------*\
077    ====** Methods **==========================================================
078        \*---------*/
079}
080//  class JavaEngine
081
082/*
083 *  End of File
084 */
